text: Privacy Policy
Update date: September 3, 2022
label: Policy Change

text: Foreword

This privacy policy is set by users (hereinafter collectively referred to as "user" or "you") and Friendship Time Technology Co., Ltd. Suzhou Qinyou Network Technology Co., Ltd. (hereinafter collectively referred to as "Qinyou" or "us")The solemn promise to protect the personal information and privacy security of users who use Qinyou products and services (hereinafter collectively referred to as "Qinyou Service").
When you use Qinyou service, we may collect and use your personal information.

We hope to explain to you through the "Privacy Policy" (hereinafter referred to as "this policy") to explain related matters such as collecting and using your relevant personal information to better protect your rights and interests.
This policy is suitable for all the Qinyou services we provided.
Except for the provisions of policy and service clauses and other announced standards, we will not publish information related to personal identity with users.
Please note that Qinyou will check his privacy measures from time to time, so related measures will change.
We urge you to regularly patronize this page to ensure that the latest version of our privacy policy always understands.
Before using various Qinyou services, you should focus on reading the clauses that are identified by the threatened/thick body, and start using it after confirmation and consent.

If you do not agree with the content of this policy, it may cause Qinyou service to be unable to run normally or to achieve the service effect we are going to achieve, and you should immediately stop access/use Qinyou services.
If you use or continue to use Qinyou services, you agree that you agree that we collect, use, and store your personal information in accordance with this policy (including updated versions).
label: Policy Change
Important
Risk
rewrite: If you use or continue to use Qinyou services, you agree that you agree that we collect, use, and store your personal information in accordance with this policy (including updated versions).

text: After reading this policy, if you have any problems with this policy or related matters related to this policy, you can contact us through the feedback channels listed in the chapter of the "How to contact us" chapters in this policy, and we will answer you as soon as possible.
1. How do we collect and use information
We collect your personal information mainly to use services easier and more satisfactory to you and other users.
label: First Party Collection Information

text: In the process of using our services, we will collect information you actively provide or because of the service provided by the service as follows to provide you with your services and ensure your account security:
label: Usage
First Party Collection Information

text: When you use our products and/or services, we need/may need to collect and use your personal information, including the following: below:
label: First Party Collection Information

text: 1. In order to realize the basic functions of our products and/or services to you, you must authorize the necessary information we collect and use.
label: First Party Collection Information

text: If you refuse to provide the corresponding information, you will not be able to use our products and/or services normally.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: If you refuse to provide necessary information, you will not be able to use products and/or services normally.

text: 2. In order to provide you with additional functions to provide you and/or services, you can choose to authorize the information we collect and use.
label: First Party Collection Information

text: If you refuse to provide it, you will not be able to use related additional functions normally or cannot achieve the functional effects we intend to achieve, but it will not affect your basic functions of using our products and/or services.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: If you refuse to provide non -necessary information, it will not be able to use related additional functions normally, but does not affect the basic function.

text: (1) Basic necessary function
1. Register and log in

(1) Mobile phone number registration and login: When you register and log in to related services, you can create an account through your mobile phone number. The information is collected to help you complete the registration and meet the real identity information certification requirements of relevant laws and regulations.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: Collect your mobile phone number to help you complete the registration and meet the true identity information certification requirements of laws and regulations.

text: The mobile phone number belongs to personal sensitive information. If you refuse to provide the "mobile phone number login" method to register and log in, it does not affect your registration and login in other ways, nor does it affect the normal use of other functions.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: If you refuse to provide a mobile phone number, you will not be able to use the "mobile phone number login" method to register and log in, but it does not affect other ways to register and log in.

text: (2) One -click login: Based on our cooperation with communication operators, when you use the "one -click login of this machine number" function, after your explicit consent, the operator will send us your mobile phone number toYou provide a quick login service.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: When you use the "one -click login of this machine number" function, you can collect your number to the operator with the consent.

text: The mobile phone number belongs to personal sensitive information. If you refuse to provide the "one -click login of this machine number" to register and log in, but it does not affect your registration in other ways, nor does it affect the normal use of other functions.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: If you refuse to provide a mobile phone number, you will not be able to use the "one -click login of this machine number" to register and log in, but it does not affect other ways to register and log in.

text: (3) Account login: You can use quickly register, we will automatically generate account numbers and passwords, so that you can register quickly.
You can also modify your registered account name and password to define registration. You can use our services by registering successful account numbers and passwords.
label: Important
Edit/Control
rewrite: You can modify your registered account name and password for custom registration.

text: (4) We may collect your network identity identification information (including system accounts, passwords, IP addresses, personal digital certificates) and personal common equipment information (including hardware serial number, hardware model, device name, equipment MAC address, operating system system, operating system systemTypes, operating system versions, software lists, device unique device recognition codes, network status, operators) are used to mark you as our users.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: We may collect your network identity identification information and personal commonly used equipment information to mark you as our users.

text: 2. Real -name authentication

In order to meet the requirements of relevant laws, regulations, policies and the requirements of relevant competent authorities, real -name authentication must be performed and enjoyed after registration.
We will collect your real -name identity information (including name, ID number, photo, etc.) when obtaining your consent or active provision.You are restricted in the process of using Qinyou games.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: You agree or take the initiative to provide your real -name identity information for your login game.

text: In order to achieve the purpose of identity certification, you agree and authorize us to provide, query, and check your aforementioned identity information to relevant identity authentication agencies (such as the national unified real -name certification system).
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
Usage
rewrite: You agree and authorize us to provide, inquire, and check your identity information to relevant identity authentication agencies.

text: (2) Additional business functions

When you use our additional business functions, in order to satisfy you the purpose of providing the product and service, in addition to the registration information, you also need to provide us with your personal identity information, location information, and other services to youInformation, if you do not use specific products and services, you do not need to provide relevant information (the following will be clarified in detail).
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: If you use specific products or services, you need to provide personal identity information, location information and other information for you.

text: 1. Based on the additional function of the camera.
You can use this function to use this function to scan the function to log in to multi -platform after turning on the camera, flash, and vibration permissions.

Important
rewrite: Open the camera, flash, and vibration.

First Party Collection Information
Usage

text: Any data collected by TrueDepth and API is only stored in your device and will not be shared with third parties.
label: Data Retention
Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important

text: Camera information is a sensitive information. Rejecting to provide this information will only make you unable to use related functions, but it does not affect other functions of your product normally.

First Party Collection Information
rewrite: Refusing to provide camera information only makes you unable to use related functions, but does not affect other functions.

text: You can turn off the camera permissions at any time.

text: 2. Function based on positioning information.
In order to quickly identify/add/invite your friends around your location, you can choose to authorize to call the location permissions in the device you use.

Important

First Party Collection Information

4. Information release function.
After you have registered successfully, you can publish a circle topic in the circle and comment on the content of other user circles.

text: 5. Payment function.
You can obtain our products and/or services related to/or service -related virtual products, including game coins, game props, etc.
Please note that the payment function will be provided to you by a third -party payment institution that cooperates with us.
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important

text: Third -party payment institutions may need to collect your name, bank card type and card number, validity period and mobile phone number.

Important
First Party Collection Information

text: The bank card number, validity period, and mobile phone number are personal sensitive information. This information is an information necessary for payment functions. It refuses to provide normal use that will cause you to unable to use this function, but does not affect other functions.

First Party Collection Information
rewrite: Refusing to provide a bank card number, validity period and mobile phone number will cause you to unable to use the payment function, but it does not affect the normal use of other functions.

text: We will not get information such as payment accounts, passwords and other information related to you.
label: Important
rewrite: We will not get information such as payment accounts, passwords and other information related to you.

text: After your successful payment, we will only obtain the verification information of your payment from the third -party payment service provider, and then provide you with the corresponding virtual products.

First Party Collection Information
Usage

First Party Collection Information

text: 6. Suspension ball function.
To help you better use our products and services, we will obtain suspended ball permissions, so that the account management related functions of our products are suspended on the application.

Important

We will obtain a compulsory withdrawal from the background process permissions to use the exit function of our products normally.

Important

To help you better use the installation service, we will obtain request installation application permissions, allowing the product to use this permissions to automatically complete the new version installation when the product releases a new version.

text: 9. Safety guarantee function.

In order to improve the security of your services to provide services with our affiliated companies and partners, protect the security of personal property of you or other users or the public, and better prevent fishing websites, fraud, network vulnerabilities, computer viruses, and cyber attacks, Security risks such as network invasion, we will collect the necessary information to achieve security guarantee functions.
label: Data Security
Important
First Party Collection Information

text: We may use or integrate your account information, transaction information, equipment information, service log information, and our affiliated companies and partners to obtain information on your authorization or sharing in accordance with the law to comprehensively judge the risk of account transaction, authentication, testing and preventionSafety events, and take necessary records, audits, analysis, and disposal measures.

Data Security

First Party Collection Information
Data Security

text: Application source.

First Party Collection Information
Data Security

Data Security

text: 12. In order to ensure your game account security, create a fair, healthy and safe game environment, we will collect information such as your game recognition information, hardware and operating system information, application lists, processes, and game collapse records to combat to combatDestroy the fair environment or interference of the game, and destroy the normal behavior of game services (such as to detect piracy, scanned plug -in, prevent cheating, etc.).

text: 2. Personal information sharing, transfer and public disclosure
(1) Personal information sharing
Except for the situation stipulated in this privacy policy, without your consent, we will not actively share your personal information until third parties.

Important

text: 1. Protection of minors

In order to better protect the physical and mental health of minors and promote the healthy access of minors, we will try to contact their guardians after suspected minors consumption, inform their guardians and inform them of relevant consumer records and other information.
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Specific Audiences
Important

text: 2. Agent product

If you use the game products issued by our agent, we may share your logs and related information (such as logging in logs, etc.) with the development subject or related third parties, for game security analysis, improve game services, and further optimize usersGame experience.
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
Usage

Data Security

Data Security
